message:
SYSTEM: 2022.11.PublicProcurementNLPChallenges.pdf: Página 29
Challenges in Public Procurement textual data
4.3. Clauses and evaluation criteria
29
Problem 3: How do clauses affect?
•
Different clauses with different evaluation criteria.
•
Could we develop a typology? (e.g., social, 
environmental, innovation…)
•
Could we develop evaluation models?
•
Sometimes, there are “special execution conditions”, how
do they affect to bidding and execution?
4
The administration 
evaluates the bids
Possible Solutions
•
Identify and generate a repository of clauses related to objects/topics/CPVs...
•
Identify and generate a repository of validation criteria related to clauses.
•
A KB or KG?
speaker: SYSTEM
